summary: SummaryMario Badescu's Witch Hazel & Rosewater Toner is a pore clarifying toner that restores radiance and leaves skin hydrated after every cleanse. This toner ensures surface impurities are removed without stripping skin of its natural moisture revealing a fresh-faced, rejuvenated complexion.
details: DetailsBenefitsAlcohol-freeRejuvenating, Rose-infused astringentRestores clarity and radiance to skin after every cleanse without stripping skin of its natural moistureLeaves skin fresh-faced and rejuvenatedItem 2535785How To UseTwice daily after cleansing, apply to skin with a cotton ball or pad. Wipe in sweeping, outward motions until the cotton comes up clean. Avoid eye area. If product gets into eyes, rinse well with water.IngredientsAqua (Water, Eau), Glycerin, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Leaf Extract, Rosa Damascena (Rose) Flower Water, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Rosa Hybrid Flower Extract, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Pentylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Propanediol, Polysorbate 20, Potassium Sorbate, Parfum (Fragrance), Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Propylene Glycol, Benzoic Acid, CI 17200 (Red 33), CI 42090 (Blue 1).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Twice daily after cleansing, apply to skin with a cotton ball or pad. Wipe in sweeping, outward motions until the cotton comes up clean. Avoid eye area. If product gets into eyes, rinse well with water.

reviews.headline: My Fav Toner
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this toner! I love how my skin feels after using it. It doesn't feel dried out and my skin feels cleaner. I have a problem with Rosacea and this has been helping to keep it under control. Im now on my second bottle and will continue to keep this as part of my daily routine

reviews.headline: Toner
reviews.comments: Good toner! Super surprised about how big it was, great bang for your buck!

reviews.headline: Def recommend for oily/combo skin girlies!
reviews.comments: I decided to try this toner because my old one was not working. Immediately after use, I could tell my skin was agreeing because of the incredible glow it gave off. It didn't feel drying to me because I have combo skin. I noticed less production of oil the next morning. It was soooooo gentle! I absolutely, totally recommend this product for my combo skin girlies!

reviews.headline: Great toner
reviews.comments: Smells fresh and is a nice toner for my oily skin. Not too harsh, but strong enough to do the job.

reviews.headline: dryyyy
reviews.comments: i dont really have sensitive skin, and this managed to dry my skin out and cause acne. smells nice…but that's abour it.

reviews.headline: This product is fantastic! Gentle & cleans without drying.
reviews.comments: I love this product and use it all the time. It has witch hazel in it, which I have always been a fan of using but it is balance with rose water. A fantastic cleaning toner without drying your skin out.

reviews.headline: Pick something else
reviews.comments: An employee at the store pushed this product on me after mentioning I had sensitive skin, thought it would be gentle. Smells like old granny and made my face more red and irritated after each use (once a week). Don't waste your money on this.

reviews.headline: drying :(
reviews.comments: liked it at first but after using it for a while i noticed it was making my skin super dry to the point of flaking, even after serum and moisturizer.

reviews.headline: Will keep buying! Lol
reviews.comments: My go to toner!

reviews.headline: I finally found a great Toner for my Acne Prone Maturing Ski
reviews.comments: Does what I want a Toner to do without drying my skin. The Rose scent is light and leaves you feeling more refreshed after use.

reviews.headline: Worst toner of my LIFE
reviews.comments: All this does is make me breakout worse EVERYDAY. I had an Ulta worker recommend this to me instead of Murad's Toner and it was the worst decision ever. Dont get this. It's terrible

reviews.headline: Go-to toner!
reviews.comments: I love this toner! I typically use this one in the morning and the lavender one at night. It's a good value for the price (and seems to be on sale often) and there is a floral scent similar to their rosewater facial spray. In my opinion the lavender one has a more mellow smell, so if you're sensitive to smells I'd recommend that one instead.

reviews.headline: Staple Toner
reviews.comments: Definitely my go to toner!

reviews.headline: It burns…
reviews.comments: It gave a burning feeling… good cleanser but painful so no worth it for me.

reviews.headline: Can't believe how well this works
reviews.comments: this toner removes so much grime I didn't know my cleanser was leaving behind. and the price point is very reasonable.

reviews.headline: Love!!
reviews.comments: Leaves my face feeling amazing! Don't forget to apply your moisturizer after!

reviews.headline: Love, love, love!!!
reviews.comments: I love this product! For years I have been using Thayer's rose toner, but not anymore. This is the best toner I've ever used and the rose scent is so relaxing and beautiful.

reviews.headline: SUPER Drying
reviews.comments: This stuff feels like alcohol and fragrance diluted by water. Not for sensitive skin, it made mine burn when I put on any moisturizer.

reviews.headline: My Go-To Toner
reviews.comments: This product has been a staple of mine in my daily skincare routine. No matter what time of the year, it's always included. It feels so nice on my skin even when it's dry.

reviews.headline: Skin so smoooooooth! Read me if you have oily skin!
reviews.comments:
Read me if you have oily skin! 

I use this twice a day after Mario's enzyme gel cleanser, apply Clinique serum (clear gel with the purple pump for wrinkles and fine lines, their new product. Can't remember the name, sorry! ), top with Bioderma "mat control" pore refiner mixed with Bioderma "mat control" mattifying moisturizer. I'm *almost* 29 with oily T zone and pore issues, this regimen has been WONDERFUL after just FOUR DAYS. My skin stays clear, sans oily t-zone, all day in summer heat. Dermstore has a fabulous tinted sunscreen that makes my skin a mattified porcelain dream! I have struggled for years with acne, now I'm just tightening my fine lines and oily skin. 

Con: This toner makes my skin smell like a 90 year old granny's perfume.
Pro: This toner makes my skin as soft as a 9 month old baby :)

media.headline: I can't live without this product in my skincare routine!
media.caption: I LOVE mario Badescu products. The Rosewater toner and hydrating spray are an amazing combo and leave my skin so clear and bright. I now can't live without these two products in my skincare routine.

faceoff_positive.comments: I've had acne problems for years and years and nothing has ever helped clear my face better than this toner. I had some cystic acne and regular breakouts and my dermatologist recommended I get on a prescription medication that had a lot of side effects. I'm so glad now that I'm not taking any intense prescription medication because after I started using this there is no need for it. This cleared my face so well in a really short period of time. I haven't broken out since I started using this product and it makes my skin look much better. I use it in combination with a Neutrogena face wash with salicylic acid and two prescription topical acne medications in the morning and night as recommended by my dermatologist. I highly recommend trying this before taking on more risky measures. I also bought my first bottle in January and have been using it every day since then and it is only halfway gone. Awesome product and I love it!!
faceoff_positive.headline: Must-try for acne-prone skin, love it!!

faceoff_negative.comments:
I give 1 star by default, second star is for marketing/consumability. Did this product make me want to buy/use it, yes. The third star is for effect vs claim. I gave the star because it has appeared to cleanse my skin while retaining a "moisture barrier" (more on that in a sec). The fourth star is for feel/usability, how do that feel and is it easily able to find its way into my daily regimen? No. In short, it leaves a film that as other reviewers have put it, feel like your face grabs onto anything and everything that touches it. This does eventually subside by about 75% but it takes about 10 minutes to get there. Once you're at that stage, you're left with a smooth yet tacky surface of skin. Given that it's astringent, you don't want to mix your moisturizers with this, it'd eat them right up, yuck. Gonna have to wait. Considering a return, as I simply don't have 15 minutes every morning to dedicate to a product because it needs its sweet time to do a tiny job. For the record, the rose water spray gives me this same "sticky film" so it may be that. Last star is for ingredients. While I enjoy nice scent in my life, I don't very much enjoy the effect that the fragrance in Badescu's most popular products. They've left out any alcohol from this product, so my non-professional opinion is that these fragrances have nothing to evaporate them and are leaving behind the worst parts. Alcohol helps bind the scent to skin and then evaporates rather quickly, while the fragrance (broken down at this stage) slowly decomposes on the skin. While this one has potentially to be a great item, the fragrance, dyes, and the idea of having to dedicate my time to a needy product all just makes me want to trade it in for something else.
PS, not sure why this listing says "online only" as it was clearly on the main display in my local ulta, along with the lavender toner as well.
faceoff_negative.headline: Sticky & Fragrant
